select sum(clWeight) as totalLWeight from ( select SUM(ClWeight ) AS ClWeight from MP_StockIn si left join MP_MaterialInfor mt on si.compid = mt.compid and si.MatCode = mt.MatCode left join MP_Supplier sl on si.SupCode = sl.SupCode and si.compid = sl.compid where si.compid = #{compid} and si.RecStatus=1
and vehicleId like '%'+#{vehicleId}+'%'
and MatName like '%'+#{MatName}+'%'
and Sup_Name like '%'+#{supName}+'%'
and MatSpecs like '%'+#{matSpecs}+'%'
and si.SecondTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime} )s

select sum(si.ClWeight) as clWeight,mt.MatName,count(*) as carcount from MP_StockIn si left join MP_MaterialInfor mt on si.compid = mt.compid and si.MatCode = mt.MatCode where si.compid = #{compid} and si.RecStatus=1
and vehicleId like '%'+#{vehicleId}+'%'
and MatName like '%'+#{MatName}+'%'
and MatSpecs like '%'+#{matSpecs}+'%'
and si.SecondTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
group by mt.MatName
